name: Dragonknight Standard
base_effect: Plant a battle standard that deals Flame Damage to enemies and applies Major Defile, reducing healing received by 16%.

name: Shifting Standard
base_effect: Plant a battle standard that deals Flame Damage and applies Major Defile. Can reactivate to move the standard to a new location.

name: Standard of Might
base_effect: Plant a battle standard that deals Flame Damage and applies Major Defile. While in the area, you deal 15% more damage and take 15% less damage.

name: Fiery Breath
base_effect: Exhale a cone of fire dealing Flame Damage and additional Flame Damage over 8 seconds.

name: Noxious Breath
base_effect: Exhale a cone of noxious fumes dealing Poison Damage and additional Poison Damage over 10 seconds. Applies Major Breach, reducing armor.

name: Engulfing Flames
base_effect: Exhale a cone of fire dealing Flame Damage over 10 seconds. Afflicted enemies take 10% more damage from Flame Damage.

name: Lava Whip
base_effect: Lash an enemy with flame, dealing Flame Damage. Enemies affected by Burning take 33% more damage.

name: Molten Whip
base_effect: Lash an enemy with molten flame dealing Flame Damage. Seething Fury stacks increase damage. Enemies affected by Burning take 33% more damage.

name: Flame Lash
base_effect: Lash an enemy with flame dealing Flame Damage. Enemies set Off Balance are stunned and you heal. Enemies affected by Burning take 33% more damage.

name: Searing Strike
base_effect: Slash an enemy with a flaming weapon dealing Flame Damage and additional Flame Damage over 10.5 seconds.

name: Venomous Claw
base_effect: Slash an enemy with poisoned claws dealing Poison Damage over 10 seconds. Damage increases over duration.

name: Burning Embers
base_effect: Slash an enemy with a flaming weapon dealing Flame Damage over 10 seconds. Heals you when effect ends based on damage dealt.

name: Fiery Grip
base_effect: Launch a fiery chain to pull an enemy to you, dealing Flame Damage and granting you Empower.

name: Empowering Chains
base_effect: Launch a fiery chain to pull yourself to an enemy, dealing Flame Damage and granting Empower for your next 3 attacks.

name: Unrelenting Grip
base_effect: Launch a fiery chain to pull an enemy to you, dealing Flame Damage. Refunds cost if target cannot be pulled.

name: Inferno
base_effect: Erupt flames around you, dealing Flame Damage to nearby enemies over 10 seconds and applying Burning.

name: Flames of Oblivion
base_effect: Erupt flames around you dealing Flame Damage over 15 seconds. Grants Minor Savagery and Minor Prophecy increasing Weapon and Spell Critical.

name: Cauterize
base_effect: Erupt flames around you dealing Flame Damage over 10 seconds. Heals you each tick based on enemies burning.

name: Combustion
base_effect: Increases damage done with Poison and Flame abilities. Also restores Magicka or Stamina when applying Burning or Poisoned.

name: Warmth
base_effect: Enemies affected by your Flame or Poison abilities are snared.

name: Searing Heat
base_effect: Increases duration of Ardent Flame abilities and increases damage from Burning and Poisoned status effects.

name: World in Ruin
base_effect: Increases Weapon and Spell Damage.

name: Dragon Leap
base_effect: Leap at target location dealing Flame Damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back.

name: Take Flight
base_effect: Leap at target location dealing increased Flame Damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back. Deals more damage.

name: Ferocious Leap
base_effect: Leap at target location dealing Flame Damage and knocking enemies back. Gain a damage shield for 6 seconds.

name: Spiked Armor
base_effect: Surround yourself with protective spikes granting Major Resolve, increasing Armor. Returns Physical Damage to melee attackers.

name: Hardened Armor
base_effect: Surround yourself with protective spikes granting Major Resolve and a damage shield. Returns Physical Damage to melee attackers.

name: Volatile Armor
base_effect: Surround yourself with protective spikes granting Major Resolve. Deals Flame Damage to nearby enemies every 2 seconds.

name: Dark Talons
base_effect: Call forth talons from the ground immobilizing nearby enemies for 4 seconds and dealing Flame Damage.

name: Burning Talons
base_effect: Call forth talons immobilizing nearby enemies for 4 seconds, dealing Flame Damage and additional Flame Damage over time.

name: Choking Talons
base_effect: Call forth talons immobilizing nearby enemies for 4 seconds, dealing Flame Damage and applying Minor Maim reducing their damage done.

name: Dragon Blood
base_effect: Draw on your draconic blood to heal for a percentage of your missing Health. Grants Major Fortitude increasing Health Recovery.

name: Green Dragon Blood
base_effect: Heal for missing Health. Grants Major Fortitude, Minor Vitality, and Major Endurance increasing Health and Stamina Recovery.

name: Coagulating Blood
base_effect: Heal for an increased percentage of your missing Health. Grants Major Fortitude increasing Health Recovery.

name: Reflective Scale
base_effect: Conjure scales to reflect up to 4 projectiles back at attackers for 6 seconds.

name: Reflective Plate
base_effect: Conjure scales to reflect up to 4 projectiles back at attackers for 6 seconds. Grants immunity to snares and immobilizes.

name: Dragon Fire Scale
base_effect: Conjure scales to reflect all projectiles back at attackers for 6 seconds. No limit on projectiles reflected.

name: Inhale
base_effect: Inhale deeply, draining nearby enemies dealing Magic Damage. Then exhale dealing additional Magic Damage to all enemies.

name: Draw Essence
base_effect: Inhale deeply dealing Magic Damage and restoring Magicka and Stamina per enemy hit. Then exhale dealing additional damage.

name: Deep Breath
base_effect: Inhale deeply dealing Magic Damage and interrupting casting enemies. Then exhale dealing additional Magic Damage.

name: Iron Skin
base_effect: Increases block mitigation.

name: Burning Heart
base_effect: Increases healing received while a Draconic Power ability is active.

name: Elder Dragon
base_effect: Increases Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery while a Draconic Power ability is active.

name: Scaled Armor
base_effect: Increases Armor.

name: Magma Armor
base_effect: Encase yourself in molten rock limiting damage taken to 3% of Max Health per hit. Deals Flame Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Magma Shell
base_effect: Encase yourself in molten rock limiting damage to 3% of Max Health. Allies near you also have damage limited to 3% of their Max Health.

name: Corrosive Armor
base_effect: Encase yourself in molten rock limiting damage to 3% of Max Health. Your attacks ignore enemy Armor for the duration.

name: Stonefist
base_effect: Launch a rock at an enemy dealing Physical Damage and knocking them back. Also stuns them for 3 seconds.

name: Stone Giant
base_effect: Launch a rock dealing Physical Damage and staggering. Each cast gains Stagger, increasing damage of next Stone Giant by 20% per stack.

name: Obsidian Shard
base_effect: Launch a rock at enemy dealing Physical Damage and staggering. Also heals a nearby ally for the damage done.

name: Molten Weapons
base_effect: Imbue your weapons with volcanic power granting you and nearby allies Major Sorcery and Major Brutality, increasing Spell and Weapon Damage.

name: Igneous Weapons
base_effect: Grant you and allies Major Sorcery and Brutality. Casting grants Minor Resolve for 3 seconds.

name: Molten Armaments
base_effect: Grant you and allies Major Sorcery and Brutality. Also increases damage of fully-charged Heavy Attacks by 40%.

name: Obsidian Shield
base_effect: Call the earth to create a damage shield for you and nearby allies.

name: Igneous Shield
base_effect: Create a damage shield for you and allies. Grants you Major Mending, increasing healing done by 16%.

name: Fragmented Shield
base_effect: Create a damage shield for you and allies. Also deals Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

name: Petrify
base_effect: Encase an enemy in stone stunning them for 2.5 seconds. When effect ends, enemy takes Magic Damage.

name: Shattering Rocks
base_effect: Encase an enemy in stone stunning for 2.5 seconds. Erupts to deal Magic Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

name: Fossilize
base_effect: Encase an enemy in stone stunning for 2.5 seconds. Converts to Stamina and deals Physical Damage when stun ends.

name: Ash Cloud
base_effect: Summon a cloud of ash dealing Flame Damage over 15 seconds. Enemies hit are snared 70% and have a chance to miss attacks.

name: Cinder Storm
base_effect: Summon a cloud of ash dealing Flame Damage. Enemies snared and may miss. Heals you while standing in the cloud.

name: Eruption
base_effect: Summon a cloud of ash dealing increased Flame Damage over 15 seconds. Enemies snared and may miss attacks.

name: Eternal Mountain
base_effect: Increases duration of Earthen Heart abilities.

name: Battle Roar
base_effect: Restores Health, Magicka, and Stamina when you use an Ultimate ability.

name: Mountain's Blessing
base_effect: Grants you and allies Minor Brutality when you cast an Earthen Heart ability.

name: Helping Hands
base_effect: Restores Stamina when you use an Earthen Heart ability.
